```{r}
source("R/evolve_pop.R")
# set parameters
fert_rab = c(0,2,6,1) # fertility
surv_rab = c(0.8,0.85,0.65,0.1) #survivability
ini = c(0,0,10,0) # initial population
nyears = 20

# use the function
rab_pop=evolve_pop(fert_rab, surv_rab, ini, nyears)

rab_pop$popbyage[1,20]
```
